alert.note: Alert for Ashley; Union (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 27 at 12:52PM CDT until May 31 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Arkansas... Ouachita River At Felsenthal Lock and Dam affecting Union and Ashley Counties. For the Ouachita River...including Felsenthal Lock and Dam, Monroe, Columbia...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ouachita River At Felsenthal Lock and Dam. * WHEN...Until Wednesday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 72.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:30 AM CDT Saturday was 72.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late Tuesday morning and continue falling to 68.8 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 70.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Sunday afternoon at 100 PM CDT.
